motds.title: Crypt Crashers
motds.body: Cast an inescapable web of darkness that sucks the life out of the spookiest parties when you enter the room.
motds.id: Crypt Crashers links to Item Shop

motds.title: Rally Royale
motds.body: On your mark. Get set. Race. Collect tickets to unlock the finish line, get there quick or get left in the dust!

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!
